note:
To create new modes of being in the world is the highest calling.

A #solarpunk future where resilience and stewardship of the ecosphere bring the earth to a new balance.

alt text for the new header:

A picture of a traditional balinese house built on a seasonal lake. The roof has a double peak of thatched panels with a frame of timber.

The lower half of the house is a stout barge constructed of sturdy timbers. Resting on a frame that holds it ot the ground and serves as it's anchorage.

fields.name: philosophy
fields.value: We should survive. People are precious.
